name: Switcher
description:
Switcher Is A Simple Minimalistic Game.


The goal is to stay alive as long as possible while your enemies, those adorable but fearful small bubbles, will try to take you down. Defeat them by going throught them.
If you are the same color as the bubble don’t panic it will think you are a friend and won’t attack you.

What If You Are A Different Color You Ask ?

Show No Mercy !
